Content:
hello

has anyone had starting problems with
Honda VT1300CT 2015 Interstate ?

i'll press the starter button
the motor starts to turn over then stops
it eventually starts with repeated pushing of starter button
but starter motor often hesitates before it catches and starts
as if the power is being drained to somewhere else

also it will sometimes zero out my digital display
so i have to reset trip meters and clock after starting

i replaced the starter button harness last year
but there was no change in the problem

i love this bike
so comfortable and easy to maintain
not a single problem before this one

anybody familiar with this problem ?

if so how did you fix it ?

thanks

Frank

Title: 2015 Interstate starter hesitation
Author: islandFrank81
